Should users recieve the commission only: Should users recieve the commission only for the first payment, or for every payment?

Enter the URL to your PHPMyAdmin install: Enter the URL to your PHPMyAdmin installation. Without a trailing slash!

The Pterodactyl API perPage limit. It is: The Pterodactyl API perPage limit. It is necessary to set it higher than your server count.

Enter the Client-API Key to a Pterodacty: Enter the Client-API Key to a Pterodactyl-Admin-User here.
If unchecked, it will disable the regist: If unchecked, it will disable the registration of new users in the system, and this will also apply to the API.
Allow upgrade\/downgrade to a new produc: Allow upgrade/downgrade to a new product for the given server
If unchecked, it will disable the creati: If unchecked, it will disable the creation of new servers for regular users and system moderators, this has no effect for administrators.
The maximum amount of allocations to pul: The maximum amount of allocations to pull per node for automatic deployment, if more allocations are being used than this limit is set to, no new servers can be created!
The minimum amount of credits user has t: The minimum amount of credits user has to have to create a server. Can be overridden by package limits.
An SEO title tag must contain your targe: An SEO title tag must contain your target keyword. This tells both Google and searchers that your web page is relevant to this search query!
The SEO site description represents your: The SEO site description represents your homepage. Search engines show this description in search results for your homepage if they dont find content more relevant to a visitors search terms.
